com.esri.mo2.map.dpy
Class BaseWorkspaceLayerSource

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.map.dpy.BaseLayerSource
        |
        +--com.esri.mo2.map.dpy.BaseWorkspaceLayerSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
LayerSource, WorkspaceLayerSource
Direct Known Subclasses:
FeatureServer, ImageDirectoryFolder, MemoryLayerSource, SDE, ShapefileFolder
Deprecated. - the class has been deprecated, see Content API.

public abstract class BaseWorkspaceLayerSource
extends BaseLayerSource
implements WorkspaceLayerSource

Provides support for a ColorScheme. Sub-classes are expected to provide support for a Workspace via getWorkspace(). A refresh method is provided here, that interacts with the Workspace to produce Layers using the ColorScheme.

See Also:
ColorScheme, Workspace
